dict.acceptation: 赢得；吸引异性；取消；（耍手腕）得逞；

sent.orig: All: Pull up, pull up, We can't pull it up. Kitty, kitty, help us!
sent.trans: 齐：拔呀拔，拔不动。小猫，小猫，帮帮我们。

sent.orig: Independent flattening electric boxes, automatic pull material, digital material length of the pull-type, simple and convenient.
sent.trans: 独立展平电热箱，自动展平拉料，数位式拉料长度输入，操作简单、方便。

sent.orig: Load-pull test of motor wheel truck is important for pull performance examination and service quality security.
sent.trans: 电动轮自卸车的负载拉功试验是检验其牵引性能、保证使用质量的重要手段。

sent.orig: Moscow first said its troops would pull out, then said troops would only pull back.
sent.trans: 莫斯科最初承诺将撤回军队，然后表示军队仅仅只是退却。

sent.orig: For adults, gently pull the earlobe up and back (pull down and back for children) .
sent.trans: 将成人耳叶轻轻向上后拉（儿童则向下、后拉）。
